So said  Demyanovich, Craig - Apogent  on  2002-09-30 

>Below is a brief conversation that took place on another mailing list.

>The
>original comment by DS was in response to another person's question
>regarding problems using JUnit for testing EJBs.  My text is marked
with my
>initials, CD.  While I will take the advice of DS and have a look at
the
>source, I wanted the group to have access to his opinion, to have
feedback
>that could be used to make JUnit better for the next release.

To the OP I say:

I don't think it would take much to add whatever interfaces are
necessary. It *is* open source, after all.

If JUnit internals suck, then don't bitch. Fix it.

J. B. Rainsberger,
